description:
The horse girls are back to charm you in this special, bite-size anime. Umayon comes alive as a cute and eye-catching anime! At a school-turned-training facility, the girls will race, perform, and train... but that's not all! Saddle up for a short-form anime that displays the laidback school days of the horse girls! Aaaaand, they're off!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Athletics
tags.description: Centers around sporting events that involve competitive running, jumping, throwing, or walking.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Detective
tags.description: Features a character who investigates and solves crimes.

node.description:
[Website](https://www.cygames.co.jp)

Cygames, Inc. is a Japanese video game development studio established in 2011 by CyberAgent, Inc.
In 2016 Cygames announced the establishment of an anime studio [CygamesPictures](https://anilist.co/studio/6182/). The company also began funding anime for its mobile property and for new projects and adaptations for anime. The company also entered the manga, music and design market in the time period.

__Height:__ 163 cm (5'4")

__[Profile](http://stay-luck.com/rena-maeda) | [Blog](https://lineblog.me/maedarena/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/renamaeda07) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/maedarena/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx7rMV5yTxtxozc398APZmA)__

Rena Maeda is a Japanese voice actress from Fukuoka, Japan. She was affiliated with AIR AGENCY, before becoming freelancer. She is now at voice actor Daisuke Namikawa's agency, Stay Luck.

__Height:__ 153 cm
__Agency:__ Racoon Dog

[Profile (Racoon Dog)](https://www.raccoon-dog.co.jp/talent/r09-kitou.html
) | [Official Site](https://kitoakari.com/) | [Twitter (Official)](https://twitter.com/kitoakari_staff/) | [Twitter (Personal)](https://twitter.com/kitoakari_1016/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kitoakari_staff/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCU_E2DHcyQu-Toohyd1vzRw)

A Japanese voice actress. She debuted in 2014, got her first main role in *Time Bokan 24* (2016), and has since received more leading roles. On October 16, 2019, her 25th birthday, she made her debut as a solo music artist under Pony Canyon. After the agency Pro-Fit shut down their operations, she joined the new agency Racoon Dog on 2022. 

**Non anime roles:**
- [Abukuma](https://anilist.co/character/228251/Abukuma), Hass, Isuzu, and Nagara - Azur Lane (VG)
- [Barbara](https://anilist.co/character/203315/Barbara-Pegg) - Genshin Impact (VG)
- [Silence](https://anilist.co/character/186429/Silence) - Arknights (VG)
- Rola - Shadowverse (VG)
- Sabrina - Memento Mori (VG)
- Ashley Graham - Resident Evil 4 Remake (VG)
- Pepper - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- [Celine](https://anilist.co/character/305904 ) - Fire Emblem Engage (VG)

__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Profile](http://www.imenterprise.jp/data.php?id=81) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuiko_ttm0917) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/28005.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yuiko_Tatsumi) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B7%BD%E6%82%A0%E8%A1%A3%E5%AD%90)

She is a voice actress currently affiliated with I'm Enterprise. She graduated from the narration school Nichinare.

[Profile](www.horipro-international.com/artist/musician/tadokoro) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/azusa-tadokoro) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/AzusaTadokoro) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/azusa_tadokoro/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/tadokoroazusaofficial)

She was a member in the tennis club at her middle and high schools, and she was also the general manager of the club in high school. When Azusa was in 8th grade, she was inspired to become a voice actress after hearing the Akiko Yajima's performance as Kohaku in Inuyasha. She participated in Horipro's 36th Talent Scout Caravan on October 11, 2011, was awarded as the grand prix winner and made her debut as a voice actress in 2012. In 2014, she made her official debut as a singer with the album "Beyond Myself!".

Azusa's hobbies including karaoke, impersonating, making albums, cooking and sewing. Her special skills include tennis - which she has been playing ever since fifth grade of elementary school - and arm wrestling, and she likes to stay healthy. She also loves both cows and movies, and has said that her ideal date would be either tennis or a movie so that she wouldn’t have to talk a lot. Azusa has four older brothers, and she went to the same high school as [Megumi Nakajima](https://anilist.co/staff/96105/Megumi-Nakajima)

(Source: BanG Dream! Wikia)

__Height:__ 158 cm
__Agency:__ Aoni Production

[Profile (Aoni)](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/kohno-marika.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/marika_0222) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/marika_kohno/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marika_Kouno) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高野麻里佳)

She is part of the seiyuu idol group [**Earphones**](https://anilist.co/staff/195973/) (イヤホンズ) with fellow voice actresses [Rie Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/119331) and [Yuki Nagaku](https://anilist.co/staff/119370), originally formed for the anime [Sore ga Seiyuu!](https://anilist.co/anime/21009).

**Non-anime roles:**
• Primavera - Memento Mori (VG)

[Official Website](https://machi.co/) | [Official Blog](https://ameblo.jp/miumachi10/) | [Profile (Horipro)](http://www.horipro-international.com/artist/machico) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MachicoOfficial) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/machico_3s25/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Machico_(singer)) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/Machico)

Machiko Saitou, better known by her stage name Machico, is a Japanese singer and voice actress from Hiroshima Prefecture who is currently affiliated with the Horipro talent agency. 

After participating in an audition organized by Horipro, she made her music debut in 2012, singing a theme song for a PC game. She was cast as the character Tsubasa Ibuki in the mobile game The Idolmaster: Million Live! in 2013. Apart from voice acting, she has performed theme songs for KonoSuba and Age 12. Machico released two albums between 2014 and 2015, and opened her official fanclub in late 2016.

(Source: Wikipedia)

__Agency:__ Racoon Dog

[Agency Profile](https://www.raccoon-dog.co.jp/talent/r11-hasegawa.html)

__Non-anime roles:__
- Rosanna - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Archetype: Earth - Fate/Grand Order (VG)
- Bridget - Punishing Gray Ravens (VG)
